name: Center Shopping Parking Driver
description:
Center Shopping Parking Driver is an impossible and insane driver skills test. Drive different cars to the shopping mall’s car parking lot and park the vehicles with ultimate driving.
Features:

• 10 exciting game play parking missions
• Multiple controls i.e. tilt, steering and touch for selection
• Multiple HD cars for selection
• Realistic car driving experience
• Excellent high quality graphics
• Enjoy driving with different camera angles
